reviews.title: Bijou hotel by Smedasund
reviews.text: This newly refurbished hotel is marred only by the size of the rooms which are tiny. This is made up for in part by the dinner buffet which, with breakfast, is included in the price.

reviews.title: Awesome hotel
reviews.text: Service is slick and friendly and the hotel has a comfortable TV lounge where one can enjoy the free (make 'em yourself) waffles and coffee.
